wikipedia_page.main: Mary Snell-Hornby (born 2 April 1940), is a British-Austrian translator and scholar.

response: Pym's ideas have been contrasted with those of the American translation theorist Lawrence Venuti by the Finnish translation scholar Kaisa Koskinen, and Pym's critique of Lawrence Venuti has been commented on by Jeremy Munday, and Mary Snell-Hornby
*”Ausbildungssituation in aller Welt (Überblick)", Handbuch Translation, Ed. Mary Snell-Hornby et al., Tübingen: Stauffenburg Verlag, 1998, 33-36. English version.
